title: Pork meatloaf
ingredients: ['450g minced pork belly', '200g smoked streaky bacon, finely chopped', '1/2 onion, minced', '2 eggs, lightly beaten', '225g breadcrumbs', '2 small apples - peeled, cored and minced', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley']
